archimate:Requirement.name: SI-4(7): System Monitoring | Automated Response to Suspicious Events
archimate:Requirement.documentation: (a) Notify [Assignment: organization-defined incident response personnel (identified by name and/or by role)] of detected suspicious events; and (b) Take the following actions upon detection: [Assignment: organization-defined least-disruptive actions to terminate suspicious events].

properties.value: Least-disruptive actions include initiating requests for human responses.
